response.original_title: Darla's Book Club: The Hundred and One Dalmatians
response.overview: Darla's Book Club is for everyone and anyone ready to discuss books, books and more books! Sometimes the stories around how books are created are even more fascinating than the fictional tales themselves! And sometimes we’re curious to learn about a book, whether we’ve read it or not. In this documentary, join Darla as she discusses the novel The Hundred And One Dalmatians. Join the club with Darla's Book Club: The Hundred And One Dalmatians!
response.title: Darla's Book Club: The Hundred and One Dalmatians
